english.segment1: Don't let your mind do all your walking. Boy you'll stumble every time. That road I seen the devil stalking. Dealin' only with the dyin'
english.segment2: Go on let the door hit 'em. where my hound dog shoulda bit 'em. Leave him open, leave him there. I don't care
english.segment3: But baby don't look down. Keep your, keep your arms around me
english.segment4: Then he showed me how he caught ya. Like a fish upon the line. Slow reelin' in he brings you closer. Like a poison that takes its time
english.segment5: Roll over little lady. Back and forth and twice around. You're gonna bleed to get away. There ain't no other way round
english.segment6: But baby don't look down. Keep your, keep your arms around me
english.segment7: Hey, hey little baby. There, there little boy. Where, where little angel. Over here my joy
english.segment8: Hey, hey little baby. There, there little girl. Where, where little angel. Over here my pearl
english.segment9: But baby don't look down. Keep your, keep your arms around me
